memberdef.argsstring: (struct k_poll_event *events, uint8_t cnt, const struct st25r3911b_nfca_cb *cb)
memberdef.name: st25r3911b_nfca_init

detaileddescription.para: This function initializes everything that is required, like interrupts and common reader functionality.

parameterdescription.para: NFC-A Events.
Event count. This driver needs 2 events.
Callback structure.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Switch on the NFC Reader field.

detaileddescription.para: If the field is switched on successfully, the nfca_cb.field_on() callback is called.

parameterdescription.para: If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Switch off the NFC Reader field.

detaileddescription.para: If the field is switched off successfully, the nfca_cb.field_off() callback is called.

parameterdescription.para: If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Detect tag by sending a detection command.

detaileddescription.para: The command is sent according to NFC Forum Digital 2.0 6.6. After success, the nfca_cb.tag_detected() callback is called.

parameterdescription.para: Command.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

detaileddescription.para: The collision resolution procedure is described in NFC Forum Activity 2.0 9.4.4. After this procedure, nfca_cb.anticollision_completed() is called.

parameterdescription.para: If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

memberdef.argsstring: (const struct st25r3911b_nfca_buf *tx, const struct st25r3911b_nfca_buf *rx, uint32_t fdt, bool auto_crc)
memberdef.name: st25r3911b_nfca_transfer

briefdescription.para: Exchange the specified amount of data.

detaileddescription.para: This is a generic function for NFC-A data exchange.

parameterdescription.para: TX data buffer.
RX data buffer.
Maximum frame delay time (according to NFC Forum Digital 2.0 6.10.1).
If set, the CRC is generated automatically by the NFC Reader. Otherwise, the CRC must be added manually to the TX buffer.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

memberdef.argsstring: (const struct st25r3911b_nfca_buf *tx, const struct st25r3911b_nfca_buf *rx, uint32_t fdt)
memberdef.name: st25r3911b_nfca_transfer_with_crc

briefdescription.para: Exchange the specified amount of data with an automatically generated CRC.

parameterdescription.para: TX data buffer.
RX data buffer.
Maximum frame delay time (according to NFC Forum Digital 2.0 6.10.1).
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

memberdef.argsstring: (const struct st25r3911b_nfca_buf *tx, const struct st25r3911b_nfca_buf *rx, uint32_t fdt)
memberdef.name: st25r3911b_nfca_transfer_without_crc

briefdescription.para: Exchange the specified amount of data with a manually generated CRC.

detaileddescription.para: The CRC must be added manually to the TX buffer.

parameterdescription.para: TX data buffer.
RX data buffer.
Maximum frame delay time (according to NFC Forum Digital 2.0 6.10.1).
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

detaileddescription.para: This function sends the tag sleep command (according to NFC Forum Digital 2.0 6.9).

parameterdescription.para: If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

detaileddescription.para: This function generates an NFC-A CRC (according to NFC Forum Digital 2.0 6.4.1.3).

parameterdescription.para: Payload data.
Data length.
NFC-A CRC value.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

detaileddescription.para: This function must be called periodically from thread to process the NFC reader state and interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.
